body:
# Overview
This is our official v30.0 release (build 6519), based on [this branch](https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/tree/v39.0).

The diff between `v38.1` and `v39.0` is here: https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/compare/v38.1...v39.0 

## Contributions
We really value contributions from the community, and would like to thank 
 
@muhasturk  
- Remove sectionHeaderTopPadding on iOS 15 (#9304) 
- Fix #9296 Search View Incorrect padding (#9304)
- #9315 - #9314 - #9287 Fix transparent navigation bar & toolbar in Tabs Tray (#9318)

# Overview
This is our official v38.01release (build 6216), based on [this branch](https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/tree/v38.1).

The diff between `v38` and `v38.1` is here: https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/compare/v38.0...v38.1.

# Overview
This is our official v38.0 release (build 6157), based on [this branch](https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/tree/v38.0).

The diff between `v37` and `v38` is here: https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/compare/v37.0...v38.0. 

## Contributions
We really value contributions from the community, and would like to thank 
 
@GetToSet 
* FXIOS-2856: Fix white colour in chron tabs confirm close alert (https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/commit/431b08bc94ad08d5645f7590c84a0d691507be86)

@kcome 
* FXIOS-3036: Update tabs counter when closing tab  (https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/commit/c20eee7d6e1cde4d5d632f7cb680b7d7e73f6673)

* Check web view before adding print activity (https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/commit/cfb0569e4f2db709b01bca4999f1f8f9f3a97480)

@gutley 
* Navigation Path Fixes (https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/commit/cb6bfd49a058c5a4a5f148d519be4106d1f363b7)

# Overview
This is our official v37.0 release (build 5971), based on [this branch](https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/tree/v37.0).

The diff between `v36` and `v37` is here: https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/compare/v36.0...v37.0. 

## Contributions
We really value contributions from the community, and would like to thank @muhasturk for https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/commit/191a36c6e852686b3b4452e4637d39527d652f08 and https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/commit/e7d700e05b22db33dc71889f309521bc2ca37886 in this release!

This is a point release that fixes #8110 - Default browser onboarding card being shown to users below iOS14

---
Thank you to our volunteer contributors:

- @chriscoderdr
Fixes #6995 If URL schema is valid but empty don't ask to… (#7798) 
Fixes: #7608 when the keyboard is minimized on scroll, the address bar should be unfocused/unselected. (#7825)
Closes #7605 Confirmation snackbars are missing from address bar context menu action: "Copy Address". (#7824)

- @vauxhall
Fixes: #7461 - Restrict usage of UIKey to iOS 13.4+ (#7461)

Diff: https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/compare/v29.2...v30.x
Build: 3279

---
Thank you to our volunteer contributors:

- @joeyg  
    Fixes #6773: Apply Dark mode to chronological tabs (#6840) 
    Fix #6820: [chron tabs] Hide Tab Tray when the last tab is removed (#6385)
- @q2r5 
    Fix #7555 - [chron tabs] New Tab Button layout broken (#7556)
    Fix #7554 - [chron tabs] Top buttons bar does not respect theme (#7557)

Build: 2860

---
Thank you to our volunteer contributors:
- @q2r5 Fix #7248: Long press on Reload button does not work
- @yusadogru Fix #7273 ⁃ Tint the default favicon black when in dark mode
- @iMostfa Fix #7147 — Command ⌘ + link to open in new tab

Build: 18809

---

Thank you to our volunteer contributors:
- @joeyg for fixing the format of the system theme setting https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/pull/6872
and hiding the tab tray when the last tab is removed https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/pull/6835
and applying dark mode to chronological tabs https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/pull/6840
- @yusadogru for fixing a crash when rearranging bookmark folders https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/pull/6980
Diff: https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/compare/26.0...27.0

- Contains new QR Code pairing screen (Disabled for China due to server misconfig https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/issues/6701) 
- Refactored onboarding cards to include new version for A/B testing

**This is a rollback of v24.0 because of localization issues - it is the same build as v23.0 just with an updated version number**

https://github.com/mozilla-mobile/firefox-ios/pull/5699

Fix an issue with string to int conversion in Application-Services
Fix an issue where bookmarks from share sheets were not being saved
Fixes an issue with UInt in the application-services logins code
Fixed an issue with sync when using the Chinese sync servers

- We've made the first step to introducing full bookmark sync. You can now delete Desktop bookmarks synced via your Firefox Account

- Firefox lets you know when certain settings are turned on, such as no image mode. An indicator will appear on the menu button to remind you that a feature is turned on.

- Fix #4731 - HTTP auth not saved for session. (#4787) 
- Fix #4790 - Top crasher 16.0: logins.db locked when suspended (#4818)
